title: 6 Brooklyn & NY Old Judges for sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 6 Brooklyn & NY Old Judges for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Donald Johnson
6 N172 Old Judge cards from Brooklyn and New York for sale. Brooklyn players are Burns (ex), O'Brien (ex-mt) and Visner (sold) (vg-ex). Giants are Tiernan (ex), Cleveland (ex-mt), Slattery (ex) and Foster (ex). All Cards have slight back damage from where they were adhered to a scrap book. Asking $300 per card.  Close-ups are available upon request.  Thanks for looking!
[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1147624857.JPG[/IMG]
